name: PCR Amplification - BRCA1
description: PCR amplification of BRCA1 gene fragments for sequencing analysis. Part of ongoing cancer research project.

name: Nanoparticle Synthesis
description: Gold nanoparticle synthesis via citrate reduction method. Investigating particle size control through temperature variation.

name: Aspirin Synthesis
description: Synthesis of acetylsalicylic acid from salicylic acid and acetic anhydride. Standard undergraduate organic chemistry experiment.
